schemas.name: schema.graphql
schemas.content:
schema {
	query: Query
	mutation: Mutation
	subscription: Subscription
}

type Subscription {
	#[B1-1]确认转账状态  返回值：状态(1:扫描成功 2:转账成功)
  	checkTrading(txid: String!): Int
}

type Query {
	#√[Q1-1]查询用户信息
	user: User

	#√[Q1-8]查询交易记录
	tradingRecords(tradingAddress: String!, contractAddress: String, limit: Int, skip: Int): TradingRecords

	#√[Q1-11]查询消息列表
	messages(limit: Int, skip: Int): [Message]

	#√[Q1-12]查询某条消息
	message(id: String!): Message

	#√[Q1-16]查询某条发布的资产
	assets(id: String!): Assets

	#√[Q1-15]查询合约信息  入参：模糊查询，key可以是合约地址、币种名称或者币种符号的一部分
	erc20s(key: String): [Erc20]

	#√[Q1-17]查询资讯信息
	articles(id: String, limit: Int, skip: Int): [Article]

	#√[Q1-18]查询备注信息
	document(index: Int!): Document	
}

type Mutation {
	#√[M1-1]获取验证码
	sendVerificationCode(phoneNumber: String!): Boolean

	#√[M1-2]快速登录
	signupOrLogin(phoneNumber: String!, verificationCode: String!, inviteCode: String): AuthPayload

	#√[M1-3]刷新token
	refreshToken(refreshToken: String!): AuthPayload

	#√[M1-4]添加鲸卡
	addAddress(address: String!, nickname: String!): Address

	#√[M1-5]修改鲸卡昵称
	updateAddressNickname(id: String!, nickname: String!): Address

	#√[M1-6]删除鲸卡
	deleteAddress(id: String!): Address

	#√[M1-7]添加通讯录名单
	addContacter(contacterAddress: String!, nickname: String!): Contacter

	#√[M1-8]更新通讯录名单
	updateContacter(id: String!, contacterAddress: String, nickname: String): Contacter

	#√[M1-9]删除通讯录名单
	deleteContacter(id: String!): Contacter

	#√[M1-10]个人实名认证
	personalCertificate(
		name: String!,
		clientIDNo: String!,
		identityCardFrontInfoID: String!,
		identityCardBackInfoID: String!
	): PersonalCertificationInfo

	#√[M1-11]企业实名认证
	companyCertificate(
		companyName: String!,
		registrationNo: String!,
		contacter: String!,
		phoneNumberOfContacter: String!,
		email: String!,
		additionalAuthentication: String!,
		accountName: String!,
		corporateAccountOfDepositBank: String!,
		corporateAccountNo: String!,
		bussinessLicenseInfoID: String!,
		identityCardFrontInfoID: String!,
		identityCardBackInfoID: String!
	): CompanyCertificationInfo

	#[M1-12]发起转账申请  返回值：返回一串交易ID(注意不是交易哈希)
	startTrading: String

	#[M1-13]准备转账  (注：txid为M1-12里返回的string)
	prepareTrading(txid: String!): Boolean

	#M1-14发布资产
	publishAssets(
		publishAddress: String!, 
		assetsName: String!, 
		assetsSymbol: String!, 
		decimals: Int!, 
		totalSupply: String!
	): Assets

	#[M1-15]删除无效资产
	deleteInvaildAssets(id: String!): Assets

	#√[M1-16]确认消息
	checkMessage(id: String): Int

	#√[M1-17]领取认证奖励
	receiveCertificationReward(toAddress: String!): Boolean

	#√[M1-18]领取邀请奖励
	receiveInvitionRewards(toAddress: String!): Boolean

	#√[M1-21]识别身份证正面信息
	resolveFrontOfIdentityCard(img: String!): IdentityCardFrontInfo

	#√[M1-20]识别身份证背面信息
	resolveBackOfIdentityCard(img: String!): IdentityCardBackInfo

	#√[M1-22]识别营业执照信息
	resolveBussinessLicense(img: String!): BussinessLicenseInfo

	#√[M1-23]添加资讯信息
	addArticle(
		sourceAt: String!
		title: String!
		source: String
		articleURL: String
		imgURL: String
	): Article

	#√[M1-24]修改资讯信息
	updateArticle(
		id: String!
		sourceAt: String
		title: String
		source: String
		articleURL: String
		imgURL: String
	): Article

	#√[M1-25]删除资讯信息
	deleteArticle(id: String!): Article

	#√[M1-26]添加交易记录
	addTradingRecord(
		txHash: String!
		from: String!
		to: String!
		amount: String!
		comment: String
		txid: String
	): Boolean
}

type AuthPayload {
	#[S1-1]
	token: String!
	#[S1-2]
	refreshToken: String!
	#[S1-3]
	expiredDate: String!
}

type User {
	#[S2-1]
	id: ID!
	#[S2-2]
	createdAt: String!
	#[S2-3]
	phoneNumber: String
	#[S2-4]
	InviterUserID: String
	#[S2-5]
	CountOfInvitees: Int
	#[S2-6]
	addresses: [Address]
	#[S2-7]
	contacts: [Contacter]
	#[S2-8]
	certificationStatuses: [CertificationStatus]
	#[S2-9]
	certificationRewards: [CertificationReward]
	#[S2-10]
	invitionRewards: [InvitionReward]
	#[S2-11]
	assetses: [Assets]
}

type Address {
	#[S3-1]
	id: ID!
	#[S3-2]
	addressString: String
	#[S3-3]
	nickname: String
}

type Contacter {
	#[S4-1]
    id: ID!
	#[S4-2]
	addressString: String
	#[S4-3]
	nickname: String
}

type CertificationStatus {
	#[S5-1]
	id: ID!
	#[S5-2]
	certType: Int
	#[S5-3]
	certStatus: Int
	#[S5-4]
	expiredAt: String
	#[S5-5]
	submitAt: String
	#[S5-6]
	auditAt: String
	#[S5-7]
	submitMark: String
	#[S5-8]
	auditMark: String
	#[S5-9]
	personalCertificationInfo: PersonalCertificationInfo
	#[S5-10]
	companyCertificationInfo: CompanyCertificationInfo
}

type PersonalCertificationInfo {
	#[S6-1]
	id: ID!
	#[S6-2]
	name: String
	#[S6-3]
	clientIDNo: String
	#[S6-4]
	idCardFrontImgURL: String
	#[S6-5]
	idCardBackImgURL: String
}

type CompanyCertificationInfo {
	#[S7-1]
	id: ID!
	#[S7-2]
	companyName: String
	#[S7-3]
	registrationNo: String
	#[S7-4]
	contacter: String
	#[S7-5]
	phoneNumberOfContacter: String
	#[S7-6]
	email: String
	#[S7-7]
	additionalAuthentication: String
	#[S7-8]
	accountName: String
	#[S7-9]
	corporateAccountOfDepositBank: String
	#[S7-10]
	corporateAccountNo: String
	#[S7-11]
	bussinessLicenseImgURL: String
	#[S7-12]
	idCardFrontImgURL: String
	#[S7-13]
	idCardBackImgURL: String
}

type IdentityCardFrontInfo {
	#[S8-1]
	id: ID!
	#[S8-2]
	imgURL: String
	#[S8-3]
	clientIDNo: String
	#[S8-4]
	name: String
	#[S8-5]
	sex: String
	#[S8-6]
	ethnicity: String
	#[S8-7]
	birth: String
	#[S8-8]
	residentialAddress: String
}

type IdentityCardBackInfo {
	#[S9-1]
	id: ID!
	#[S9-2]
	imgURL: String
	#[S9-3]
	authority: String
	#[S9-4]
	issueDate: String
	#[S9-5]
	invalidDate: String
}

type BussinessLicenseInfo {
	#[S10-1]
	id: ID!
	#[S10-2]
	imgURL: String
	#[S10-3]
	registrationNo: String
	#[S10-4]
	unifiedSocialCreditCode: String
	#[S10-5]
	enterpriseName: String
	#[S10-6]
	typeOfEnterprise: String
	#[S10-7]
	residence: String
	#[S10-8]
	legalRepresentative: String
	#[S10-9]
	registeredCapital: String
	#[S10-10]
	dateOfEstablishment: String
	#[S10-11]
	termOfBusiness: String
	#[S10-12]
	scopeOfBusiness: String
	#[S10-13]
	typeOfOrganization: String
}

type CertificationReward {
	#[S11-1]
	id: ID!
	#[S11-2]
	createdAt: String!
	#[S11-3]
	toAddress: String
	#[S11-4]
	receivedAt: String
	#[S11-5]
	expiredAt: String
	#[S11-6]
	txHash: String
	#[S11-7]
	rewardStatus: Int
	#[S11-8]
	rewardContent: RewardContent
}

type InvitionReward {
	#[S12-1]
	id: ID!
	#[S12-2]
	createdAt: String!
	#[S12-3]
	toAddress: String
	#[S12-4]
	receivedAt: String
	#[S12-5]
	expiredAt: String
	#[S12-6]
	txHash: String
	#[S12-7]
	invitee: String
	#[S12-8]
	rewardStatus: Int
	#[S12-9]
	rewardContent: RewardContent
}

type RewardContent {
	#[S13-1]
	id: ID!
	#[S13-2]
	createdAt: String!
	#[S13-3]
	rewardType: Int
	#[S13-4]
	rewardPoint: String
	#[S13-5]
	rewardMark: String
	#[S13-6]
	expiredAt: String
}

type Assets {
	#[S14-1]
	id: ID!
	#[S14-2]
	createdAt: String!
	#[S14-3]
	publishAddress: String
	#[S14-4]
	assetsName: String
	#[S14-5]
	assetsSymbol: String
	#[S14-6]
	decimals: Int
	#[S14-7]
	totalSupply: String
	#[S14-8]
	publishStatus: Int
}
 
type Message {
	#[S15-1]
	id: ID!
	#[S15-2]
	sendAt: String
	#[S15-3]
	checkedAt: String
	#[S15-4]
	checkStatus: Int
	#[S15-5]
	toUserID: String
	#[S15-6]
	messageContent: MessageContent
}

type MessageContent {
	#[S16-1]
	id: ID!
	#[S16-2]
	createdAt: String!
	#[S16-3]
	title: String
	#[S16-4]
	content: String
	#[S16-5]
	fromUserID: String
}

type TradingRecords {
	#[S17-1]
	totalCount: Int
	#[S17-2]
	records: [TradingRecord]
}

type TradingRecord {
	#[S18-1]
	txHash: String
	#[S18-2]
	createdAt: String!
	#[S18-3]
	createdAtGroup: String
	#[S18-4]
	blockNumber: Int
	#[S18-5]
	tradingType: Int
	#[S18-6]
	tradingStatus: Int
	#[S18-7]
	amount: String
	#[S18-8]
	amountDecimals: String
	#[S18-9]
	amountDecimalsClip: String
	#[S18-10]
	gas: String
	#[S18-11]
	gasDecimals: String
	#[S18-12]
	gasDecimalsClip: String
	#[S18-13]
	symbol: String
	#[S18-14]
	decimals: Int
	#[S18-15]
	from: String
	#[S18-16]
	to: String
	#[S18-17]
	otherAddress: String
	#[S18-18]
	contractAddress: String
	#[S18-19]
	contractName: String
	#[S18-20]
	comment: String
}

type Erc20 {
	#[S19-1]
	address: String
	#[S19-2]
	blockNumber: Int
	#[S19-3]
	name: String
	#[S19-4]
	totalSupply: String
	#[S19-5]
	decimals: Int
	#[S19-6]
	symbol: String
}

type Article {
	#[S20-1]
	id: ID!
	#[S20-2]
	createdAt: String!
	#[S20-3]
	sourceAt: String
	#[S20-4]
	title: String
	#[S20-5]
	source: String
	#[S20-6]
	articleURL: String
	#[S20-7]
	imgURL: String
}

type Document {
	#[S21-1]
	id: ID!
	#[S21-2]
	createdAt: String!
	#[S21-3]
	index: Int
	#[S21-4]
	title: String
	#[S21-5]
	paragraphs: [String]
}
